channel.title: Gpg on Jaigarage
channel.description: Recent content in Gpg on Jaigarage

item.title: Pass: The Unix Password Store
item.description: pass, also known as the Unix password store, is a simple, command-line-driven password manager that follows the Unix philosophy. It stores passwords in GPG-encrypted files, organized in a simple directory tree, and can be easily synchronized using Git.
